title: Sales Officer

likes:
I was a Branch Product Trainer at GSM department. After close down of GSM department I was shifted in HEHA department. After shifting none of the staff has co-operated with me. Every time I was humiliated that in GSM section I have done nothing. I have started as a SSE in GSM department back 10th Aug 2012. Later on 2018 January I was promoted as BPT after that I was with the company till GSM was there. But wherever I have shifted to HEHA from RBH to ASM everytime and Every hour they tried to prove I am incapable and not suitable for the section. They humiliated all the time. All the task given by RBH sir and Asm Sir I have tried to be done by hook or crook but If I achieved the same then also they humiliated me with another purpose. Later I was tortured mentally to resign from the post. I have down my paper atlast. Its was like 5years to have 2months in the system of HEHA. But in GSM section I have spend best professional part of my life under BM Sir Bidish Chatterjee and NPT Abhradeep Basumallik my reporting boses. I will remember them rest of my life still I alive.
Regards,
Debraj Kar...Read More
dislikes:
There are huge internal politics you can't survive on the system without somebody's hand in your head (Like RBH, BM and ASM).
Offroll employees are treated to be like a beggar in the company. Everytime they will show you bloody as a offroll employee and humiliation at its most.
